title: Mysterium Lake Bliss Collectors Edition-Wendy99
description:
::::::: WENDY99 PRESENTS :::::::


:::: Mysterium: Lake Bliss Collectors Edition-Wendy99 ::::


::Information::


Genre: Adventure | Hidden Object | Puzzle


Molly Huggins, a young bride-to-be, summons you to the beautiful resort town of Lake Bliss to find her missing groom. Is Tommy Drake seeing another woman, or is 
he the latest victim in a series of drownings plaguing the city? Be careful, the siren's haunting melody may lure you into the dark waters next! Follow the clues, interview suspects, and uncover what's lurking along the shores of Lake Bliss in this intriguing hidden-object puzzle adventure game.


This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.


The Collector's Edition includes:


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Uncover the evil sleeping beneath Lake Bliss
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reunite a bride with her groom
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fun achievements to earn
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Concept Art, Soundtrack, Wallpapers and Movies
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Integrated Strategy Guide


System Requirements:


OS: Windows XP | Windows Vista | Windows 7 | Windows 8
CPU: 1.8 GHz
RAM: 1024 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 1.19 GB
Browser: Internet Explorer 7 or later


Install and play!
